name: PANAMAZON - Think outside the box
description:
You done did it good, amidst a tricky forklift operation you manage to get unalived, and now you are stuck in Panamazon's purgatory warehouse. Well, what is another eternity in a menial workplace?

Credits:

Mikkel-A: Programming, level design, rendering pipeline researc

Moeren: 3D models, asset implementation, level design
